item.title: A New Worldview — Through Service
item.description: DominiCANT Believe It’s Over *The title of this should've been a <em>Nhu</em> Worldview, because of the puns made on this trip, but for it to make sense to others, I opted to keep it like it is. I just returned from a trip to the Dominican Republic. I've changed as a person through the experience, gaining a new perspective on the world and its people. I went with the Ryan Nece Foundation (@powerofgiving ) as a part of the Student Service Program, and I am so thankful that I got this opportunity.
